communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All Forms CJ9, CJ9-A, CJ10, or CJ10-A sent from your agency to the Department of Justice, Bureau of Justice Statistics, in compliance with the Death in Custody Reporting Act since January 1, 2015. 

We make this request on behalf of the #DetentionKills Transparency Initiative of Al Otro Lado.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Free

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: BJS DCRA Forms
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All Forms CJ9, CJ9-A, CJ10, and CJ10-A received by DOJ Bureau of Justice Statistics from the Department of Homeland Security or its agency components U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement and U.S. Customs and Border Protection and from the Department of Health and Human Services or its agency component Office of Refugee Resettlement, within the Administration for Children and Families. 

Please provide all forms received beginning October 1, 2015 to the date on which the agency tasks an adequate search for this request.

In lieu of the forms themselves, we would also consider accepting a list of all forms received by date and agency reporting,  if the agency agrees to deliver such list within 20 working days from its receipt of this request. 

We request these records on behalf of the #DetentionKills Transparency Initiative of Al Otro Lado.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Free
